caption: The two men are talking with the woman, but the woman doesn’t like the way she is called. One of the men has a friend visited and leave the room after taking something. And then the woman leaves the room after talking to the remaining man in the room near the door. However, and first man comes back leave the room with the last man in the room. They take a taxi and memorize the thing happened before. Finally, they get into a place with the permission of a woman, and argue with a man near an entrance of a building.
